title: Fantasy Adventure & Exploration
description: Explore lands old and new, familiar and mysterious with the Fantasy Adventure & Exploration music pack.  This cinematic orchestral pack is sure to enhance the magic of the adventure games you create!
longDescription:
Welcome to my "Fantasy Adventure & Exploration" music pack!


Preview all tracks here Preview - SoundCloud (full tracks and Sampler*)

Preview all tracks here Preview - YouTube (10 second sample of each track)

*Sampler - The Sampler track on SoundCloud is a 10 second preview of each track included to help you quickly get a feel for what's in this pack. The Sampler track is what is used for the YouTube video


Inside this pack you will find 15 unique tracks reaching 43 minutes and 53 seconds. Using both live instrument recordings, as well as virtual instruments I hope to bring in truly fantastical music into your games to immerse players seamlessly with the worlds you are creating. Every track in this pack is filled with orchestral and medieval instruments to really bring that fantasy element to life. ALL MUSIC IS YOUTUBE SAFE!


Genre/feel:

These tracks are all fantastical, cinematic and orchestral with some synthetic enhancements to make these tracks feel larger than life.


This pack includes 4 main categories of tracks, although many of them fit into more than 1 of these categories:

  • Magical - Mystical, fun, and mysterious tracks that really immerse the player in unexplored lands
  • Peaceful - Cozy, tranquil, and nostalgic music that will remind the player of safe and familiar places
  • Unsettling - Perfect for places that are filled with enemies and danger
  • Vast - Immerse the player in expansive landscapes to enrich your games world-building and story telling


About me

I am a professional composer who has had music on national television shows from The Bachelor and Bachelorette to Backyard Bar Wars and 90-day Fiance. This means that each track is professionally composed, mixed, and mastered to guarantee the highest quality sound for your game. Each track has carefully crafted melody and harmony to ensure interest and repeatability in your game so the track never gets old.


LOOPABLE?

EVERY track in this pack loops perfectly. Reverb tails were carefully added to each track to ensure that all tracks will loop perfectly and seamlessly with no cracks or pops.

I personally guarantee your satisfaction with these tracks and hope you enjoy the music as much as I enjoyed making it for you.


*Any updates will be free after your first purchase!*


Please contact me with any questions:

dkcompose@gmail.com
